item.title: Manhole cover, 12th January
item.description:
Making a report for this again, because the issue of the loose manhole cover still hasn't been fixed. I hear the cover banging all day - and throughout the night! - despite all my windows being closed and living on Burney Street. I've written to the council twice about this (first time more than a month ago) and nothing has been done. If someone was standing outside physically banging it with a hammer at three in the morning, we would have been able to call the police and the noise would soon stop. Yet the council thinks it's ok to do nothing despite multiple complaints from multiple people.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwich High Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Offensive graffiti, 12th January
item.description:

item.title: Street lights no power, 12th January
item.description:
Street lights have no power in alley way ( Billy Fury Way ) need confirmation on where the source of power comes from. As it is on my construction drawing need some confirmation and clarifaction of what has to happen. With these street lights. We have taken over this site from Another builder so information has been lost
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Billy Fury Way, West Hampstead, Greater London

item.title: Large branch has broken off and obstructing pavement, 12th January
item.description:
